title: The 7 Sins Trilogy
description: Join M.A.C. Morrison as he takes you on a ride through Hell in this collection of his 7 Sins book series featuring the never before released 3rd and final installment "The 7 Sins in Escape From Hell"7 Lost souls find themselves in Hell with no memory of who they are or why they have been sent to the underworld, but as time goes on their story's are revealed to them in pieces and as they are finally judged and sentenced one will defy the Devil and make for a great escape!If you enjoy the writings of H.P. Lovecraft and Clive Barker you will find yourself disturbingly at home with the writings of M.A.C. Morrison. Born and raised on the streets of Rockford Illinois M.A.C. has always found a love for the realm of horror, writing short story's as a teen, now he brings those story's to you...
author: M.A.C. Morrison
